title: Los Angeles/Downtown
name: The Cathedral of Our Lady of the Angels
hours: M-F 6:30AM-6PM, Sa 9AM-6PM, Su 7AM-6PM (''hours extended to 7PM during daylight savings time'')
content: This large and austere cathedral, dedicated to Saint Vibiana, is the head of the Archdiocese of Los Angeles. It was opened in 2002 at a cost of nearly $200 million, replacing The Cathedral of St Vibiana which was heavily damaged in the 1994 earthquake.
